title: Ep 521 | Phil Sees a Tractor Mechanic for His Blood Disorder & Jase Receives a Fishy Package
description:
Phil talks about his blood problem and the man he sees for help, who doubles as a tractor mechanic. Jase cracks a joke about Phil getting his oil changed, and Al discusses a passage from the Bible in which a valley of bones snap together and regain their breath from God. Jase tells a hilarious story about receiving a very fishy package in the mail. Al shares his theory about a lack of blood in the afterlife and how it's connected to earthly beings.

Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Go to https://UnashamedMerch.com and use Code: Unashamed10 for 10% off and BlazeTV Subscribers get 20% off with the Code: BlazeSub
